title: Do Running Backs Matter? | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Russell Wilson just signed the richest deal in NFL history. How will Wilson's payout affect the future quarterback market? (0:40) Also, the best running backs to draft, the right time to draft them, and whether it even matters (9:15). Finally, how the worst teams in the NFL can improve their rosters in this year's draft (24:30).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
